• Collaborate with design and product teams to translate AI capabilities into intuitive experiences.
• Have up to 6 years of full-stack engineering experience delivering production products.
• Care about building seamless, reliable experiences for end users.
• Design, build, and operate scalable backend services and web interfaces for products like ChatGPT and the OpenAI API.
• Implement user-facing features using React/TypeScript while maintaining robust server-side logic in languages such as Python or Go.
• Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and security.
• Participate in on-call rotations to ensure high availability and performance.
• Are comfortable working across the stack with technologies such as React, TypeScript, Python, Go, and modern cloud infrastructure.

• Have up to 6 years of professional software engineering experience.
• Design and build robust backend services and APIs that power products like ChatGPT and the OpenAI API.
• Develop scalable data pipelines and storage systems for high-volume, low-latency workloads.
• Improve system reliability, observability, and security across production environments.
• Collaborate with product and research teams to translate cutting-edge AI into dependable, user-ready features.
• Participate in an on-call rotation to maintain uptime and respond to critical incidents.
• Are proficient in one or more backend languages (e.
• , Python, Go, Rust, or similar) and distributed systems concepts.

• Build and ship new experiences on Android that showcase the power of AI.
• Have up to 6 years of professional software engineering experience.
• Prioritize performance, security, and user experience in mobile development.
• Optimize app performance, reliability, and responsiveness at global scale.
• Establish robust testing frameworks and refine app architecture for long-term maintainability.
• Collaborate with product, design, research, and backend teams to deliver high-impact features.
• Provide technical leadership to shape the future of OpenAI’s Android platform.
• Have a proven track record of building high-quality Android applications in production.

• 4+ years of relevant industry experience, with 2+ years leading large scale, complex projects or teams as an engineer or tech leadA passion for distributed systems at scale with a focus on reliability, scalability, security, and continuous improvement.
• Proven experience as an reliability engineer, production engineer, or a similar role in a fast-paced, rapidly scaling company.
• Experience with containerization technologies and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.
• Experience with observability tools such as Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana, Splunk and ELK stack.
• Experience with microservices architecture and service mesh technologies.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
• Have experience operating orchestration systems such as Kubernetes at scale and building abstractions over cloud platformsAre comfortable working in Linux environments, and with tools like Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD pipelines, and modern observability stacks.
• Are experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure that reliability and scalability are considered in the design and development of new features and services.
